sub_title: Docent Chemie at Avans University of Applied Sciences
summary: Experienced Researcher with a demonstrated history of working in the higher education industry. Skilled in Chemistry, Plastics Engineering and Biopolymers. Strong research professional with a Bachelor of Applied Science (B.A.Sc.) focused in Chemical Engineering from Avans Hogeschool Breda.
